title: the excavation (including excavation of wells) made in the ordinary course of agricultural operation
clause_text: the excavation (including excavation of wells) made in the ordinary course of agricultural operation. the construction of a road intended to give access to land solely for agricultural purpose.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: the excavation (including excavation of wells) made in the ordinary course of agricultural operation.
